mapper.insert: insert into company (id, yahooId, name, market, currency, industry, sector, quote, yesterdayClose, changeInPercent, yield, marketCapitalization, yearHigh, yearLow, realTime, fund, manual, lastUpdate) values (0, #{yahooId}, #{name}, #{market}, #{currency}, #{industry}, #{sector}, #{quote}, #{yesterdayClose}, #{changeInPercent}, #{yield}, #{marketCapitalization}, #{yearHigh}, #{yearLow}, #{realTime}, #{fund}, #{manual}, NOW())
mapper.update: update company set name = #{name}, market = #{market}, currency = #{currency}, industry = #{industry}, sector = #{sector}, quote = #{quote}, yearLow = #{yearLow}, yearHigh = #{yearHigh}, yesterdayClose = #{yesterdayClose }, changeInPercent = #{changeInPercent}, yield = #{yield}, marketCapitalization = #{marketCapitalization}, realTime = #{realTime}, fund = #{fund}, manual = #{manual}, lastUpdate = NOW() where yahooId = #{yahooId}
mapper.select: select * from company where realTime = #{realTime} and manual = #{manual}
SELECT company.id from company where company.id NOT IN (SELECT equity.companyId FROM equity UNION SELECT follow.companyId FROM follow)
